pages.text: The Transmitter is used to transmit notes from a MIDI File to instruments in MIMI.$(br2)To use a Transmitter, craft one, place it into your main or off hand, and right-click to open the Transmitter Screen.$(br2)The Transmitter acts a bit like an Ender Chest in that each player only has one, and every Transmitter item will be the same for that player.

Once a song is playing it will continue playing as long as one Transmitter is in one of your hands or on your hotbar.$(br2)To open a Transmitter on your hotbar without selecting it, you can use a key bind ($(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.transmitter)$()).
